sentences.sContent: Cats prey on birds and mice.
...we will finally fall prey to it...
...Europe has fallen prey to a different ideological trap: the belief that European governments would always have infinite resources and could continue borrowing as if there were no tomorrow...

synos.tran: 捕食；牺牲者；被捕食的动物

phrases.pCn: 成为...的牺牲品；深受...之害

remMethod.val: 心中暗自祈祷(pray)不要成为猎物(prey)

trans.tranOther: an animal, bird etc that is hunted and eaten by another animal
(of an animal or a bird) to hunt and kill another animal for food
